index.subheader: Unitarianism is an open-minded religion that encourages religion freedom and individual quest for truth. We recognise that it is a person's right to freely find their own belief through their own reason, while respecting the beliefs of others.
index.aboutDescription: Unitarianism is one of the oldest non-conformist religions with hundreds of thousands of members worldwide.
index.historyDescription: Uniratianism developed itself independently in various countries, with more than 400 years of history to be told.
index.involvedDescription: Anyone can be a Unitarian, regardless of their beliefs and religions. There are many ways to get involved with other Unitarians in Thailand.
